text: Todd Lynn Helton (born August 20, 1973) is an American professional baseball first baseman who played his entire 17-year career for the Colorado Rockies of Major League Baseball. Helton had a batting average of .316 during his career and he hit 369 home runs. Helton also played football, and he was a quarterback at the University of Tennessee. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:American baseball players Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from Knoxville, Tennessee Category:Colorado Rockies players
title: Todd Helton
